introduction.title: A dedicated mobile app is the best investment for your business
content: When designing and developing mobile apps, we combine unique design with solid code, ensuring full responsiveness and performance. Every app includes a custom graphic design tailored to your industry and target audience, resulting in a professional mobile app that stands out from the competition and supports sales or promotion of your project.

We focus on performance and user convenience. Our mobile apps load instantly thanks to modern optimization techniques. This approach ensures your customers won’t complain about lagging or poor user experience while using your app.
introduction.alt: Image of Earth – headquarters of a mobile app development company

fasterwebs.title: Faster Applications
fasterwebs.content: When creating modern mobile apps, we select the right platforms so the product is fast, stable, easy to use, and perfectly tailored to you and your future users. In most projects we use React Native, which enables us to build efficient, optimized apps simultaneously for both Android and iOS. We often create more advanced systems that include both a mobile app and a website, sharing a common backend (e.g. WordPress). In other cases, we use MongoDB as the database. We constantly broaden our horizons, and in the very near future we plan to add several new mobile technologies to our offer (such as Flutter).

cooperation.title: Mobile App Development Process
cooperation.content: Creating a mobile app is a complex process, but thanks to our proven approach we guide you through it step by step – clearly, transparently, and without unnecessary complications. From the very first contact to post-launch support, you have full control over the project and always know what’s happening. Here’s how our cooperation works in practice:

steps.title: Brief
steps.desc: We start with a conversation to learn about your goals, expectations, and requirements. Based on this, we present the best solutions and define the project scope.

steps.title: Agreement
steps.desc: Once details are agreed, we send the contract for signature – either online or traditional form. After signing, for larger projects we ask for a 30% upfront payment.

steps.title: Design
steps.desc: We create a unique UX/UI design adapted to all screen sizes. The design is sent for review, we apply revisions, and finalize the layout and look of your app.

steps.title: Development
steps.desc: We move on to programming and implementing the app – building the front-end and back-end, and optimizing the project. At this stage, we also carry out app testing.

steps.title: Delivery & Settlement
steps.desc: After finishing the work, we present the final product, issue the final invoice (minus the advance payment), and hand over access data and the user manual.

steps.title: Technical Support
steps.desc: For 12 months we provide technical support, minor updates (up to 3h/month), and backups. We’re here whenever you need us.

pricingIntro.title: How long does it take and how much does a mobile app cost?
pricingIntro.content: The estimated cost of a mobile app depends mainly on its complexity, functionalities, and specific project requirements. The time needed depends on the scope – a simple mobile app usually costs a few thousand PLN and takes around 3–4 weeks to complete. For more advanced projects, costs may range from several to dozens of thousands of PLN, with development lasting several weeks depending on complexity. The price includes not only programming, but also performance optimization, help with publishing on Google Play and App Store, and integration with a dedicated website. For more demanding clients, we offer a special package that includes professional photography – a photographer comes to your location with guidelines, takes the necessary photos (team portraits, buildings, products), and delivers edited files ready to be used in your app.

faq.title: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about mobile app design and development
faq.content: In this section, you’ll find answers to the most common questions about working with us – from the brief stage, through technology choices, to project timelines, as well as post-launch support for your website or app. If you can’t find the information you’re looking for, contact us and we’ll reply within 24 hours.

qna.q: How much does a mobile app cost and how long does it take?
a: The cost and timeline depend directly on the functional scope (complexity) and integrations. A simple app with a catalog and form usually costs a few thousand PLN and can be delivered in 3–4 weeks. Medium-complexity apps (login, profiles, notifications, API integration) typically require several weeks and cost around a dozen thousand PLN. More advanced apps with complex integrations, payment systems, offline synchronization, or an admin panel may take several months and cost tens of thousands of PLN.
For larger projects we use a phased model with an advance payment (standard 30%). We provide a detailed quote and timeline after a short brief – free of charge, usually within 24 hours.

qna.q: For which systems and in what technologies do you create apps? – App development platforms.
a: We choose tools to balance deployment speed, performance, and scalability. Most often we use React Native, which allows maintaining one codebase for Android and iOS without major performance loss. When specific hardware features or exceptional optimization are required, we combine cross-platform solutions with native modules. For backend we rely on proven approaches (REST/GraphQL, secure authorization mechanisms) and plan scalability according to expected traffic. When an app needs to be paired with a website, we often use WordPress as a shared backend for both platforms.

qna.q: What exactly do I receive after app publication?
a: After project completion, we deliver a fully ready product: final installation packages for app stores, access to the source code repository with setup instructions, technical and user documentation, graphic assets required for app stores, and basic integration setup (API, analytics, payments). You’ll also receive GDPR consent templates and privacy policy guidance, plus a support package – 12 months warranty with up to 3h/month of fixes. For clients requiring continuous maintenance and development, we offer extended support plans.

qna.q: I have an app idea – how does the cooperation work and what do you need from me at the start?
a: The process is divided into stages: short meeting/brief, contract and schedule, UX/UI design, iterative implementation, testing on real devices, and final delivery. To speed things up, it helps to prepare functional priorities (must-haves vs nice-to-haves), brand materials (logo, texts – if missing, we can help prepare them), and access to systems the app will integrate with.

On request, we also organize professional photography: a photographer comes to your location, takes product and team photos according to agreed guidelines, and delivers edited files ready for use in the app (with rights/licenses transferred). This accelerates final design and raises visual quality. At each stage, you have full visibility and the chance to provide feedback – transparency and client control are our priorities.

qna.q: Do you help with publishing apps on App Store and Google Play?
a: Yes – we handle the entire preparation and publishing process: writing descriptions, creating required screenshots, icons, and assets, verifying compliance with store policies, and assisting in setting up developer accounts. If you prefer, we can publish the app on your behalf once you provide the necessary access. Since the stores have their own specific requirements (e.g. regarding permissions, privacy policies, payment testing), we provide a checklist of what needs to be done on your side to speed up approval.

qna.q: What are your security standards, GDPR compliance, and maintenance options after launch?
a: We design with security in mind from the start: safe data storage and transmission, authentication and authorization mechanisms, and practices that minimize vulnerabilities. We prepare consent screens and GDPR documentation, and assist with data processing agreements. After launch, we provide a standard 12-month warranty with basic support, plus optional maintenance packages including monitoring, priority fixes, and regular security updates – with SLA options tailored to your business needs.
